package.name: trikey_pinned_controlit
package.description: Contains files related to the "trikey_pinned" robot in the Human Centered Robotics Lab (HCRL). Generate the URDFs in package "trikey" prior to running the "trikey_pinned" simulation!
package.author: Chien-Liang Fok
Gwendolyn Johnson
J.D. Yamokoski
